text: Jens Dyhr Okking, (18 December 1939 – 21 January 2018) was a Danish actor and politician. Okking is mostly known outside of Denmark from Lars von Triers TV- series The Kingdom. Okking was a member of the European Parliament in 1999–2003. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Danish stage actors Category:MEPs for Denmark Category:Actors from Copenhagen
title: Jens Okking
